医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
价格上涨与英格兰成年人和老年人较高的心理健康服务利用率有关英国人口价格上涨与精神科护理之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Price-inflation-tied-to-higher-mental-health-service-utilization-among-adults-and-elderly-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Price-inflation-tied-to-higher-mental-health-service-utilization-among-adults-and-elderly-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90fdd531-8754-41bf-8b76-caaede951b72 Mon, 06 May 2024 05:51:00 -0400 Price inflation tied to higher mental health service utilization among adults and elderly in England
研究表明，在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情期间，年轻人的饮酒量有所下降2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 对年轻人饮酒和困难的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-reveals-decrease-in-alcohol-use-among-young-adults-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-reveals-decrease-in-alcohol-use-among-young-adults-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32605e39-de64-4fac-abf2-bedfd78c49ce Mon, 06 May 2024 05:22:00 -0400 Study reveals decrease in alcohol use among young adults during COVID-19
经验教训：根据 MPOX 经验制定未来大流行应对策略一篇新的基于证据的文章探讨了英国应如何应对未来的流行病，其中包括对边缘化社区的有针对性的支持、强有力的公共信息传递以及由部长领导的适当协调的政府方法等建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lessons-learned-Strategies-for-future-pandemic-response-based-on-mpox-experience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lessons-learned-Strategies-for-future-pandemic-response-based-on-mpox-experience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecb5d977-be72-4fc2-b63e-2a5b532e3e00 Mon, 06 May 2024 03:07:00 -0400 Lessons learned: Strategies for future pandemic response based on mpox experience
3D 打印外科植入物彻底改变神经系统疾病的治疗方法位于人体内并恢复受损神经元的巧妙生物墨水可以在未来 20 年内治愈一系列疾病：几个世纪以来一直困扰科学家和临床医生的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Revolutionizing-treatment-for-neurological-conditions-with-3D-printed-surgical-implants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Revolutionizing-treatment-for-neurological-conditions-with-3D-printed-surgical-implants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=219793f1-2d15-4d7f-9115-612290b3d082 Mon, 06 May 2024 02:54:00 -0400 Revolutionizing treatment for neurological conditions with 3D printed surgical implants
WHI 报告了绝经后妇女健康的重要发现布里格姆大学的研究人员及其同事报告了美国最大规模的女性健康研究的长期随访，揭示了更年期激素疗法、钙和维生素 D 补充剂以及低脂饮食模式的作用。绝经后妇女https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/WHI-reports-key-findings-on-postmenopausal-womene28099s-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/WHI-reports-key-findings-on-postmenopausal-womene28099s-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f2d52e8-23b4-44ef-a924-f80b32aa5a03 Mon, 06 May 2024 02:50:00 -0400 WHI reports key findings on postmenopausal women’s health
Genomics plc 和 GSK 合作在临床试验中利用多基因风险评分Genomics plc 和葛兰素史克 (GSK) 宣布开展一项新合作，探索在临床试验中使用多基因风险评分 (PRS) 的潜力，以增进对疾病风险和患者选择的了解，从而支持试验设计的优化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Genomics-plc-and-GSK-collaborate-to-harness-polygenic-risk-scores-in-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Genomics-plc-and-GSK-collaborate-to-harness-polygenic-risk-scores-in-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56971d71-9d0e-4e92-853f-81f13ebeeebe Mon, 06 May 2024 02:48:00 -0400 Genomics plc and GSK collaborate to harness polygenic risk scores in clinical trials
研究：Omega-6 脂肪酸可降低双相情感障碍的风险南澳大利亚大学的一项全球首个研究表明，鸡蛋、家禽和海鲜中常见的 Omega-6 脂肪酸可以降低双相情感障碍的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-Omega-6-fatty-acids-could-reduce-the-risk-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-Omega-6-fatty-acids-could-reduce-the-risk-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=211cc08a-c907-464a-a4a5-8ee0a2ec18cf Mon, 06 May 2024 02:45:00 -0400 Study: Omega-6 fatty acids could reduce the risk of bipolar disorder
乳腺癌现在资助新研究来调查乳腺癌细胞如何生存和生长在“Breast Cancer Now”的新资助下，谢菲尔德的研究人员正在研究乳腺癌细胞如何生存和生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Breast-Cancer-Now-funds-new-research-to-investigate-how-breast-cancer-cells-survive-and-grow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Breast-Cancer-Now-funds-new-research-to-investigate-how-breast-cancer-cells-survive-and-grow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32add370-5ad1-460e-83f0-a223760355b1 Mon, 06 May 2024 02:42:00 -0400 Breast Cancer Now funds new research to investigate how breast cancer cells survive and grow
复杂的区域疼痛综合症治疗显示出康复的希望复杂区域疼痛综合症 (CRPS) 是一种慢性且令人衰弱的疼痛疾病，通常被认为是终生的，治疗选择有限。现在，突破性的研究发现，早期发现和有效治疗可以在 18 个月内实现显着康复，为全世界数百万人带来希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Complex-Regional-Pain-Syndrome-treatment-shows-promise-for-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Complex-Regional-Pain-Syndrome-treatment-shows-promise-for-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d48304a3-c327-476e-83a2-933457e8f021 Mon, 06 May 2024 02:39:00 -0400 Complex Regional Pain Syndrome treatment shows promise for recovery
Janssen-Cilag 寻求欧洲批准 guselkumab 用于治疗溃疡性结肠炎和克罗恩病强生公司旗下 Janssen-Cilag International NV 今天宣布，已向欧洲药品管理局 (EMA) 提交申请，寻求扩大 TREMFYA®（guselkumab）的营销授权申请，以包括治疗中度至重度成人患者活动性溃疡性结肠炎和中度至重度活动性克罗恩病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Janssen-Cilag-seeks-European-approval-for-guselkumab-in-ulcerative-colitis-and-Crohne28099s-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Janssen-Cilag-seeks-European-approval-for-guselkumab-in-ulcerative-colitis-and-Crohne28099s-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44c143c5-5773-441c-9005-a057e3aceadd Mon, 06 May 2024 02:33:00 -0400 Janssen-Cilag seeks European approval for guselkumab in ulcerative colitis and Crohn’s disease treatment
